edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.external.attributes
Class LocationMonitor

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.external.attributes.LocationMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
SystemServiceEventMonitor
public class LocationMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements SystemServiceEventMonitor

The class is responsible for communication with the Location Service. It provides access to Location Services External Attribute, as well as Initiates Location Change Intents.

getAttributeValue

public OmniArea getAttributeValue()
                           throws ExternalAttributeAccessException
Returns current location.

Returns:
OmniArea object that has longitude, latitude, and accuracy (proximityDistance)
Throws:
ExternalAttributeAccessException - throws an exception if attribute is unavailable.
